thread.title: Shia LaBeouf arrested for public drunkenness in Texas

title: Shia LaBeouf arrested for public drunkenness in Texas
text:
Shia LaBeouf arrested for public drunkenness in Texas Updated: Â© PRNewsFoto / International Watch Company, Patricia Schlein / WENN.com TVGuide Photo Galleries More>> Shia LaBeouf has been arrested for public intoxication in Austin, Texas, People reports. More >> Shia LaBeouf has been arrested for public intoxication in Austin, Texas, People reports. More >> John Goodman showed of a significantly slimmed-down physique on Thursday. More >> John Goodman showed of a significantly slimmed-down physique on Thursday. More >> Yolanda Foster isn't the only one battling Lyme disease in her family. More >> Yolanda Foster isn't the only one battling Lyme disease in her family. More >> It was the pic seen 'round the world. More >> It was the pic seen 'round the world. More >> 
By Shelli Weinstein, 
Shia LaBeouf has been arrested for public intoxication in Austin, Texas, People reports. 
LaBeouf was drunk in the street on Friday evening, in the popular nightlife section around 6th Street. He was arrested without the use of force, though officials said that he was slightly belligerent and uncooperative. 
This is not the first time has had issues with alcohol and the law. In June 2014 the actor was arrested during a performance of Broadway's Cabaret for being disorderly and verbally abusive. A week after, he sought out treatment for alcohol addiction and later plead guilty to the charges.
